title: How to Get the "Cut" HM in Pokémon FireRed and LeafGreen

steps.title: Meet the prerequisites.
steps.content: Meet the prerequisites. You receive the "Cut" HM from the captain of the S.S. Anne in Vermilion City, so you must first travel to Cerulean City before you can begin.

steps.title: Go all the way up to the Nugget Bridge.
steps.content: Go all the way up to the Nugget Bridge. This bridge is near the top of Cerulean City.

steps.title: Defeat
steps.content: Defeat the five trainers and their leader. Before you can cross the bridge, you'll need to defeat the five trainers here, as well as defeat their leader.

steps.title: Receive safe passage.
steps.content: Receive safe passage. Once you've defeated all six of the enemies, you can cross the bridge. If you have any healing potions, make sure that you heal up your Pokémon before proceeding.

steps.title: Cross Nugget Bridge.
steps.content: Cross Nugget Bridge. This will take you north of Cerulean City.

steps.title: Head north until the map ends.
steps.content: Head north until the map ends. Once you can't go up any further, you can proceed to the next step.

steps.title: Head east.
steps.content: Head east. Take a sharp right and continue until you're stopped by a trainer.

steps.title: Battle any trainers between you and the big house.
steps.content: Battle any trainers between you and the big house. You'll need to defeat several trainers between you and the largest house in town. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Enter the house.
steps.content: Enter the house. Once you arrive at the largest house in town, head inside. You should see a Pokémon in the middle of the room.

steps.title: Talk to the Pokémon inside the house.
steps.content: Talk to the Pokémon inside the house. This will give you permission to use the computer in the corner.

steps.title: Use the computer.
steps.content: Use the computer. Stand in front of the computer, select it, and wait for the Pokémon to turn back into a human being. You may need to select a computer option in order to trigger this event.

steps.title: Receive the S.S. Anne pass.
steps.content: Receive the S.S. Anne pass. Once the Pokémon changes into a human named Bill, he will reward you with the boarding pass to the S.S. Anne in Vermilion City.

steps.title: Go back to Cerulean City.
steps.content: Go back to Cerulean City. Head west from the large house, then head south to cross back over Nugget Bridge. This will take you back into Cerulean City.

steps.title: Beat Misty's gym
steps.content: Beat Misty's gym . Go to Misty's water gym and battle her. Once you complete this task, Vermilion City will unlock. Since Misty's gym is a Water-type environment, using a Grass- or Electric-type Pokémon is recommended.

steps.title: Go to the house that had a cop in front of it.
steps.content: Go to the house that had a cop in front of it. This house is to the east of Misty's gym. You'll notice that this house now has no one in front of it.

steps.title: Navigate to the Underground Tunnel entrance.
steps.content: Navigate to the Underground Tunnel entrance. Head through the house, then head to the south-east until you arrive at the Underground Tunnel house.

steps.title: Go through the tunnel.
steps.content: Go through the tunnel. Head down into the house to do so. You'll emerge on the other side, straight into Vermilion City.

steps.title: Head over to the boat walkway.
steps.content: Head over to the boat walkway. You'll find this section toward the south end of Vermilion City. A guard will stop you if you try to walk onto the walkway.

steps.title: Show your pass to the guard.
steps.content: Show your pass to the guard. Press A to do so. The guard will allow you on-board at this point.

steps.title: Defeat any trainers and your rival.
steps.content: Defeat any trainers and your rival. Board the boat and make your way through it, battling anyone you encounter when prompted. You'll ultimately run into your rival here; after defeating him, you'll be able to continue along to find the captain.

steps.title: Find the captain.
steps.content: Find the captain. Head up the stairs behind your rival to enter the captain's quarters. You'll find him next to a bucket.

steps.title: Rub the captain's back.
steps.content: Rub the captain's back. Walk up to the captain and press A to do so.

steps.title: Receive the "Cut" HM.
steps.content: Receive the "Cut" HM. Once the back rub is complete, the captain will reward you with the "Cut" HM. You can now use it with your preferred Pokémon.

steps.title: Apply the "Cut" HM to a Pokémon.
steps.content: Apply the "Cut" HM to a Pokémon. Once you've allowed one of your Pokémon to learn the "Cut" HM, you'll be able to cut down path-blocking trees throughout the world by selecting the Pokémon and using it on the tree(s).
